title: Office Building / Premises means the premises whose sole or principal use is to be used as an office
clause_text: Office Building / Premises means the premises whose sole or principal use is to be used as an office or for office purpose; ―office purposes‖ shall include the purpose of administration, clerical work, handling money, telephone / telegraph / computer operations; and ‗clerical work‘ shall include writing, book-keeping, sorting papers, typing, filing, duplicating, drawing of matter for publication and the editorial preparation of matter for publication and such other activities;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Office Building / Premises means the premises whose sole or principal use is to be used as an office or for office purpose; ―office purposes‖ shall include the purpose of administration, clerical work
